title: Laura Ingalls Wilder: A Pioneer's Life

description: “Home is the nicest word there is.” These are the words of pioneer and renowned Little House author Laura Ingalls Wilder. From the vast Kansas prairie to the cold Dakota Territory, Laura had many homes throughout her youth. It was only late in her life that she began to share her childhood memories through a series of unforgettable books. Students will enjoy learning about the life and adventures of Laura Ingalls Wilder in this engaging and detailed text. Book and lesson are also available at Levels V and Y.
